thread.title: Hotel de France Invalides
thread.title_full: Hotel de France Invalides - Review of Hotel de France Invalides, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Glinda2017
title: Hotel de France Invalides
text: This was an upgrade on our package to a three star. When we arrived in our room it was so small and dark I immediately went to the desk and asked if they had an upgrade room. We paid an extra 30 euros per night to get a room that had a little more room and windows facing the street. This was our fifth city and hotel on this trip and the most disappointing. The staff was very nice and accommodating but I would not chose this hotel again.
